oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A.P. Stewart
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stewart, Alexander Peter; Confederacy; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Text on back: A.P. Stewart. -- Alexander Peter Stewart (October 2, 1821 – August 30, 1908) was a career United States Army officer, college professor, and a general in the Confederate States Army during the American Civil War. Alexander was born in Rogersville, Tennessee [theroyalhouseof stewart.com].
